title: Watch Wawrinka on Challenger TV
description: Stan Wawrinka will compete in the Open Aix Provence CrÃ©dit Agricole semi-finals Saturday, when he faces Borna Gojo at the ATP Challenger 175 event in France. The Swiss wild card is aiming for his first final appearance at any level since July 2023. Wawrinka and Gojo are scheduled to play the second match from 2 p.m. local time. The first semi-final will feature former No. 12 Borna Coric and Peru's Ignacio Buse. Challenger

Michelsen, Kecmanovic face off in Top 50 battle in Estoril

May 02, 2025

Nicolas Averty

Stan Wawrinka is competing as a wild card at the Aix-en-Provence Challenger. By ATP Staff

Stan Wawrinka will compete in the Open Aix Provence CrÃ©dit Agricole semi-finals Saturday, when he faces Borna Gojo at the ATP Challenger 175 event in France.

The Swiss wild card is aiming for his first final appearance at any level since July 2023. Wawrinka and Gojo are scheduled to play the second match from 2 p.m. local time. The first semi-final will feature former No. 12 Borna Coric and Peru's Ignacio Buse. Coric is seeking a season-leading fourth Challenger crown this week.

Last 4 standing in France! ðŸ‡«ðŸ‡·#ATPChallenger | @OpenduPaysdAix pic.twitter.com/LgJThE5wvA

â€” ATP Challenger Tour (@ATPChallenger) May 2, 2025

Fans can tune into Challenger TV to stream all ATP Challenger Tour matches live and on demand at no cost.

At the Millennium Estoril Open in Portugal, second seed Alex Michelsen meets Miomir Kecmanovic, a rare Top 50 showdown at Challenger level. Andrea Pellegrino faces Aleksandar Vukic at 3 p.m. local time, with Michelsen and Kecmanovic to follow, not before 4:30 p.m. local time.

Watch Stan Wawrinka vs. Borna Gojo (second match from 2 p.m. local time)

Watch Alex Michelsen vs. Miomir Kecmanovic in Estoril, Portugal (not before 4:30 p.m. local time)
